    • Constructor Detail

      • Treatment

        public Treatment(java.lang.String description,
                 double price,
                 double marginalBenefit,
                 double deltaSeverity,
                 healthABM.TreatmentType typeTreatment)
        Parameters:
        description - Short description of the treatment
        price - Cost of treatment (for the patient)
        marginalBenefit - Marginal benefit of the provider: cost to patient - cost for provider
        deltaSeverity - Change in the change of severity per period. This number will be added to deltaSeverity of the illness to get the total change
        typeTreatment - Type of treatment using TreatmentType
